New Records: Shohei Ohtani reached a career-high 104 runs this season, surpassing his previous mark of 103 set in 2021.
Shohei Ohtani is pursuing the first major league record of 50 homers and 50 stolen bases in a single season.
Key Match Events: Shohei Ohtani and his dog Decoy handled the ceremonial first pitch.

The Dodgers were expected to perform well against the Orioles, especially with Shohei Ohtani in the lineup.
Post-Match Reflections: Dodgers manager Dave Roberts praised Shohei Ohtani's performance and the team's resilience.

Miscellaneous Highlights: The Orioles were hindered by errors and poor offensive performance.
